entry.title: Full Circle - 24" x 22" Utility White Garbage Bags- 500/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Full Circle
Type: Disposables
Price: 25.99

Choose this 7-10 gallon trash bag for an economical, strong solution to waste collection.
Trusted brand 7-10 gallon trash bag as a solution to all of your waste management needs!

Perfect Utility Bag for use in the office, bedroom and washroom.

Each bag comes neatly and individually folded in it's packaging, to allow for convenient dispensing.

This versatile can liner is perfect for bars, kitchens, and catered events. With all of the same benefits of a traditional low density liner, this bag is environmentally-friendly so you can save money and go green!

Available in full range sizes with the convenience of collecting and storing garbage. Other uses include storing on housekeeping carts, storage cabinets and bottom of water receptacle.

Other features

  • Frosted performance liners made with LLDPE resins manufactured with 100% renewable energy.
  • EcoLogo certified making this both environmentally safe and cost efficient.
  • Our garbage bags are black in color and they come in various sizes and strength

entry.title: Full Circle - 42" x 48" Extra Strong Black Eco Garbage Bag - 100/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Full Circle
Type: Disposables
Price: 29.99

Choose this 50-55 gallon trash bag for an economical, strong solution to waste collection.

Trusted brand 50-55 gallon trash bag as a solution to all of your waste management needs!

Each bag comes neatly and individually folded in it's packaging, to allow for convenient dispensing.

This versatile can liner is perfect for bars, kitchens, and catered events. With all of the same benefits of a traditional low density liner, this bag is environmentally-friendly so you can save money and go green!

Our EcoLogo certified garbage bags are thick, flexible, and highly resistant to puncturing and tearing. We ensure that these bags provide the ideal solution for carrying and sustaining trash material.

These bags are EcoLogo certified by the Environment Canada program, which is a well-recognized 3rd party certification body.

Our garbage bags are black in color, and they come in various sizes and strengths.

These bags are suitable for offices, schools, Industries, hotels, and hospitals.

entry.title: WFN - S4 Printed White Biodegradable Shopping Bags 18" x 22" - 500/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: BulkMart
Type: Disposables
Price: 27.99

Take a green step forward with this biodegradable plastic t-shirt bag.

For a tough and durable plastic bag, choose this biodegradable t-shirt bag. With the same heat / cold tolerance and shelf life as traditional plastic bags, this environmentally-friendly option provides the same convenience without the wastefulness and damaging carbon footprint

Biodegradable, Reusable, and Recyclable

Made from environmentally friendly, recyclable HDPE material, this bag's construction allows decomposition. It fully breaks down much faster than other bags, therefore lowering your carbon footprint!

Attractive Color

The attractive color, along with the leafy design, is a step up from white plastic bags, while also demonstrating the bag's eco-friendliness.

Dual Handles

Great for carrying heavy items, the dual handles make this bag perfect for grocery stores, delis, take-out restaurants and more!

Both convenient and eco-friendly, t-shirt bags are perfect for grocery stores, delis, and take-out restaurants. They are just like regular plastic t-shirt bags, but are biodegradable and healthier for the environment!

Provide your customers with a durable bag for toting their purchases in with these T-shirt bags. These quality bags are made to resist ripping and tearing. This sturdy bag has the ability to successfully hold good weight! Its durable construction means that fewer bags can be used per customer, cutting down on cost.

Ideal for grocery stores, convenience stores, restaurants, and retail locations, lightweight T-shirt bag is perfect for bringing home groceries, to-go containers of food, or merchandize. The bag is thick and resists rips and tears to keep items from breaking through the material and falling out of the bag. Combined with the rip and tear resistant material, this bag also features convenient cutout handles for easy carrying. Furthermore, this bag is a cost effective and it can easily be recycled.
